means: 混（时间）( dawdle的现在分词 )

sentence.Network_en: Stop dawdling! We're going to be late!
sentence.Network_cn: 别磨蹭了，咱们快迟到了！

sentence.Network_en: It was all because of your dawdling that we were late.
sentence.Network_cn: 都是你老磨蹭,害得我们迟到了.

sentence.Network_en: Stop dawdling and finish your work!
sentence.Network_cn: 别瞎泡了,快把工作做完!

PerfectNetExp.abs: dawdler 游手好闲dawdling 闲逛的dawk 邮政
rather than continuing dawdling diplomacy it would be prudent for the US to a cease-fire .相对于继续拖延时间的外交斡旋，对美国来说实现停火是个更谨慎的选择。
You are always dawdling ., 你总是泡蘑菇.

list.abs: stop dawdling and do something useful !不要挨时间了，做点有益的事吧！
longshanks.bokee.com ... 自闭症儿童 autistic child 小混混 dawdling punk 白骨精 office elite.
Look sharp ! Don ' t dawdle about like that ., 快点 ! 别这么磨磨蹭蹭了.
rather than continuing dawdling diplomacy it would be prudent for the US to a cease-fire .相对于继续拖延时间的外交斡旋，对美国来说实现停火是个更谨慎的选择。

entry.def: If you dawdle, you spend more time than is necessary going somewhere.

example.ex: Eleanor will be back any moment, if she doesn't dawdle...
example.tran: 如果不闲荡的话，埃莉诺随时都会回来。

example.ex: They dawdled arm in arm past the shopfronts.
example.tran: 他们手挽手慢悠悠地逛过一家家店面。

entry.def: If you dawdle over something, you spend more time than is necessary doing something.

example.ex: He got fed up as bank staff dawdled over cashing him a cheque...
example.tran: 银行职员慢吞吞地给他兑现支票，他憋了一肚子气。

example.ex: She downed two glasses of white wine while I dawdled over a draught beer.
example.tran: 我慢悠悠地呷着一杯散装啤酒的工夫她已经灌下了两杯白葡萄酒。

means.word_mean: 1. the deliberate act of wasting time instead of working

auth_sentence.content: No dawdling at any rate with the Glass Ensemble, performing their daily bread.
auth_sentence.res_content: No dawdling at any rate with the Glass Ensemble, performing their daily bread.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: No dawdling at any rate with the Glass Ensemble, performing their daily bread.

auth_sentence.content: The Big Red Balls are still big, red and ball-like, but the Demotivator provides new inspiration for those dawdling on the ramp.
auth_sentence.res_content: The Big Red Balls are still big, red and ball-like, but the Demotivator provides new inspiration for those dawdling on the ramp.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The Big Red Balls are still big, red and ball-like, but the Demotivator provides new inspiration for those dawdling on the ramp.

auth_sentence.content: It seems that wherever we look, there is a clock or a calendar pressuring us to move faster and stop dawdling.
auth_sentence.res_content: It seems that wherever we look, there is a clock or a calendar pressuring us to move faster and stop dawdling.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It seems that wherever we look, there is a clock or a calendar pressuring us to move faster and stop dawdling.
